file.name: example.openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Example OpenAPI spec
  version: 0.0.1
paths:
  '/example':
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExamplePost'
      responses:
        204:
          description: No content
components:
  schemas:
    # Renaming this key from `Example` to `ExampleGet` stops the issue from occurring
    # Removing this key stops the issue from occurring
    Example:
      $ref: example.get.yaml
    ExamplePost:
      $ref: example.post.yaml

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /example: post: operation "": requestBody: content: "application/json": parse schema: parse schema: resolve "#/components/schemas/ExamplePost": parse schema: resolve "example.post.yaml": find schema: external base "example.post.yaml" is not supported
